name: Exploding Dice
description:
Roll dice to earn money.

Sixes will explode into more dice. This will give a bonus.

Clicking Collect will award you with money from all the dice on the table.

Hit the pickup to get more bonus.

If a die falls down the table, either on left side or in a hole, you will lose all dice on the table, and another hole will spawn! 

Will you collect early, or risk it all to get high bonuses?

Solo game developed in 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2022. I did everything except the font.

Font - Dogica by Roberto Mocci

Graphics - Aseprite

Music and Sound - Ocenaudio and Beepbox.co. Recorded dice sounds myself.
